titles.title: Lead-free Students Act
To amend the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to require students to undergo lead screenings.
Lead-free Students Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Lead-free Students Act
This bill amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 (ESEA) to require a local education agency, as a condition of receiving ESEA funds, to require a student to undergo blood lead-level testing prior to enrolling in an elementary school for the first time.
